title: WTB: OJ Wantlist Can You Help?
author: packs

posts.post_title: WTB: OJ Wantlist Can You Help?
posts.post_content:
Hey OJ Collectors,

I'm in the market for the following OJ's in the SGC 40-80 (PSA fine) range:

Jimmy Ryan
Bobby Mathews
Count Mullane
Any Managers
Any HOFers (in the SGC 30 - 50 range)

I'd also like to track down examples from all the tough teams, Toronto, Denver, Mets, etc. If you have some toughies in any condition please send me an e-mail.

E-mail: [url]rare_baseballstuff@yahoo.com[/url]

contact [url]nkasarada@cs.com[/url]

He might have one of those on your list

posts.post_title: Still have over 250 old judge cards in stock
posts.post_content:
Hi,

Dave's Vintage Baseball Cards
